Uses of Package
org.joty.common

    Class and Description
    AbstractDbManager.ExcCheckType 
    BasicPostStatement.Item
    This inner class contains in a textual form a value compatible with the datum wrapped by the WrappedField object or the value of a ContextParam object.
    BasicPostStatement.ReturnedValueItem 
    CaselessStringKeyMap
    An HashMap descendant that offers simple way of use.
    ConfigFile
    Hosts the content of a configuration file within an internal map of String objects.
    ConfigFile.ConfigException 
    ErrorCarrier
    Simply a wrapper for error notification content.
    ICommon 
    IJotyDate 
    JotyMessenger 
    ParamContext
    It contains a map of named items (ContextParam) capable to host the value of a Joty datum.
    ParamContext.ContextParam 
    ParamContext.CTXP_type 
    ReportManager.Parameter 
    Utilities
    It is a collection of multi-purpose static methods thought for use in the Joty framework and in the Joty application.
    Utilities.Stocker
    Stocker an HashSet descendant that offers simpler syntax of use.
    XmlTextEncoder
    Provides Base64 encoding and decoding of data hosted by the java.lang.String instances.
